messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Now the thing has escaped containment

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It esaped from a ship but we can still die

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All staff assistants are to be killed

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's simple animals has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
